columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RYN_WHT_RACE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's race as defined in the Ryan White Service Report (RSR).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


White


Black or African American


Asian


Native Hawaiian/Pacific Islander


American Indian or Alaska Native
